title: Join Typophile on the new Rooms app for iOS!
content:
Come join the Typophile room on [http://Rooms.me](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415144301/http:/rooms.me/ "http://Rooms.me"), and share your best mobile pics of typography throughout the day!

Get the app here:. So far it looks like they've only created the iOS version...  
 [https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/rooms-create-something-together/id924643...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415144301/https:/itunes.apple.com/us/app/rooms-create-something-together/id924643029?mt=8 "https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/rooms-create-something-together/id924643029?mt=8")

Rooms is owned by Facebook but run somewhat independently. Read their privacy policy: [http://www.rooms.me/privacy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415144301/http:/www.rooms.me/privacy "http://www.rooms.me/privacy")

To get access, you'll need to use the app to scan this code.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415144301im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typophile_room_600_4010.png)
author: Jared Benson
